communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: MO DPS MOUs, MOAs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of Memoranda of Agreement (MOAs), Memoranda of Understanding (MOUs), contract guidelines, charter guidelines or records documenting guidelines for collaborative agreement between your agency and any local, state or federal law enforcement multijurisdictional task forces, committees, coalitions, councils or commissions for fiscal years of both 2022 and 2023.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, processed by a representative of the news media/press and is made in the process of news gathering and not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Hawkins

title: Knightcope/NY Agency Request (New York City Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Under the New York State Freedom of Information Law (FOIL), I hereby request the following records:

- Contracts/MOUs/Invoices with Knightscope, Inc.
- Company relations and communications: records related to meetings or follow-up actions with Knightscope, Inc
- All marketing materials - unsolicited, requested, or otherwise - acquired from Knightscope, Inc
- Any policy directives, guidance documents, memoranda, training materials, or similar records governing the use of Knightscope, Inc technology
- Training material governing the use, sharing, or access to any related data related to or collected by Knightscope, Inc, including the legal standard that is required before using the technology

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andy Friedman

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andy Friedman
